overview: This off the hook comedy centers on “Ray Ray” West, a pro ball player turned actor who’s weary of the pace. So he takes a break to go home to A-Town and chill with his girl and six old homies. When they decide to have a Bar-B-Q, word gets out and the rest of the neighborhood crashes the backyard boogie.
tagline: A Hip Hop Comedy Featuring Rappers
title: Bar-B-Q
